description: Honest Greens is a pioneering vertical farming initiative in Sri Lanka, founded in 2015 to address food security challenges. Utilizing advanced technology, the farm grows a variety of crops, primarily lettuce and herbs, in a controlled environment. This innovative approach allows for year-round production, significantly reducing land use and environmental impact. With a focus on sustainability, Honest Greens aims to scale its operations and share its model globally, promoting self-sufficiency in food production.
name: Honest Greens
